name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jotaro Kujo: Stand Proud – A Legendary Presence in Every Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jotaro Kujo from JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure live wallpaper featuring a clock and Google search bar for your new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Watch Jotaro Kujo stand tall with his iconic Stand, Star Platinum.
Minimalist Design: A simple, clean interface for smooth navigation.
Clock and Date: Elegant time and date display to keep you organized.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Instantly access your favorite websites.
Search Bar: Browse seamlessly with the built-in search tool.
More Extension: Unlock extra features to customize your experience.
